Author: lemonye
Text: I’m a few years older and god i remember thinking this at 18 and now having the same thoughts still is depressing. I thought I’d have it all under control by now. I need to lose 10 kg by Christmas

Author: nnneow
Text: Same, I gotta lose at LEAST 16kg (about 35 lbs) by mid-December or I’m just hopeless. Preferably 40-45 lbs but that’s if I manage to stick to a combination of IF + mono meals + fasted cardio + tons of green tea  Oof here we gooo
